dq_myr_spy.title: Wolves Among Stone
dq_myr_spy.summary: Enter Myriador as a shadow. Gain King Aldredor’s trust. When the time comes, Myriador must fall from within.
steps: Choose your cover story for entering Myriador.
Arrive at Myriador’s outer gate without exposing your ties to Helheim.
Earn a first audience with King Aldredor.
Gain the King’s trust enough to be kept close.

cover.label: Choose your cover story for entering Myriador.

audience.label: Earn a first audience with King Aldredor.

dq_myr_spy.reward: Myriador opens its gates to you.
